title: Super Fast, Super Savings: The Samsung 870 EVO SSD Drops in Price by 27%
description: Amazon's Deals of the Day can also net you the Roku Ultra (2024) media streaming device for under $80, and an HP LaserJet printer for a $50 discount.
content:
Today’s Amazon deals check all the right boxes if you're hunting for value in your next tech upgrade. The Samsung SSD 870 EVO is now 27% off and still keeps up with pricier PCIe drives for quick boots, fast loads, and long-term reliability. The Roku Ultra (2024) is just $78 and great for turning any old TV into a streaming machine, thanks to Wi-Fi 6, a backlit remote, and buttery smooth 4K playback. Need a no-fuss printer? The HP LaserJet M234dw is $50 off and nails fast, clean document printing without eating up your desk or your weekend setup time.

If these deals aren’t quite what you're looking for, don’t worry. We have a few more for you from and that are still available.

The Samsung SSD 870 EVO is an amazing SATA SSD now for 27% off. It's super fast for things like launching games, booting up Windows, and running creative programs. According to our tests, it even competes with some PCIe drives in those areas. Its durability is impressive, and Samsung's Magician software lets you easily manage the drive. "It should be at the top of anyone's list who wants the best combination of performance and product quality," expert said in our 2021 , which gives it an "Outstanding" rating and an Editors' Choice award.

If you want to upgrade your old TV for streaming OTT platforms (a potentially more cost-effective option than buying a new television, the Roku Ultra (2024) is waiting for you. It's faster, supports Wi-Fi 6 for reliable connectivity, includes a handy Ethernet port, and the new remote has backlit buttons and USB-C charging, which is a nice touch. Our expert highlights its user-friendly experience, stating, "It offers quick and simple access to streaming services and content through its accessible menu system." Rated as "Excellent" in our , it's a great pick at just $78 for smooth 4K streaming and is worth it for simplicity and speed.

The HP LaserJet MFP M234dw is a pretty sweet deal with $50 off if you print a lot but also don’t want to spend a ton. It’ll set up in a breeze even if you’re not tech-savvy, while it's not bulky either and fits nicely on a small desk. The mobile app makes it easy to scan or print straight from your phone. Our tester, , gave it an “Excellent” rating in and said it, “churns out great-looking text and grayscale graphics.” If you mostly print documents and want to save cash long-term, this one makes a lot of sense.

Keep the savings coming with today.
summary: The Samsung 870 EVO SSD has been discounted by 27% on Amazon, with the Roku Ultra (2024) for $78. The HP LaserJet M234dw is also $50 off, offering fast, clean document printing without taking up to a lot. The Samsung SSD is fast for launching games, launching Windows, and running creative programs, and its durability is impressive. The Roku Ultra supports Wi-Fi 6, a backlit remote, and smooth 4K playback. If you want to upgrade your old TV for streaming OTT platforms, the Roku is also a great pick.
shortSummary: Amazon.com offers 27% discounts on Samsung's Samsung SSD 870 EVO, HP LaserJet M234dw, Roku Ultra (2024), and HP laserJet M4dw for $50 each.
